MotorStorm® Broken Boombox

A genuine 1980’s boombox – great to look at but no longer in working order. Just as well as the tape deck only played backwards and the radio station was stuck on BRBK FM 102.2 - Saddle Sore Cowboy Poetry with Big Al. Whatever floats your boat, pard'ner...[#Legal]

A genuine 1980’s boombox – great to look at but no longer in working order. Just as well as the tape deck only played backwards and the radio station was stuck on BRBK FM 102.2 - Saddle Sore Cowboy Poetry with Big Al. Whatever floats your boat, pard'ner...[#Legal]

Une authentique stéréo des années 80. Superbe à regarder, mais hors d'état de marche : le lecteur cassette ne fait que rembobiner et la radio est bloquée sur BRBK FM 102.2 diffusant de la poésie de cowboy dépressif. Yep, pour sûr, part'ner..[#Legal]

Ein echter 80er-Jahre-Ghettoblaster. Sieht gut aus, funktioniert aber nicht mehr richtig. Das Kassettendeck spult auch nur noch zurück und das Radio hängt bei BRBK FM 102.2 "Lyrik für sattelmüde Cowboys mit Big Al". Jeder nach seiner Façon ...[#Legal]

Un vero radioregistratore degli anni '80 – bello da vedere, ma non proprio ben funzionante. Il registratore riproduceva le cassette al contrario e la radio era bloccata sull'emittente BRBK FM 102.2 - Big Al e le Poesie dei Cowboy con Piaghe da Cavalcata. Qualunque cosa dia sollievo alla tua anima assetata, amico...[#Legal]

Un auténtico equipo de música de la década de 1980: tiene una pinta genial, pero ya no funciona. La pletina solo reproducía la música hacia atrás y el dial estaba atascado en Radio Piratilla, en el 109.2 de la FM, con sus homenajes a Cañita Brava. Y el caldo de María sigue sabiendo mal...[#Legal]
1980年代に使われていた大型ラジカセ – レトロ感バッチリの鑑賞アイテム。残念なことにこのラジカセでお好きな８０'sのヒットソングなどを楽しむことはできない。テープデッキは逆再生しかできず、ラジオはBRBK FM 102.2 のカントリーステーションだけ放送されている。[#Legal]
진정한 1980년대 스테레오입니다. 보기에는 좋지만 더 이상 작동하지는 않습니다. 어차피 카세트 테이프는 너무 고속으로 돌아갔고, 라디오는 BRBK FM 102.2에서 움직일 수 없었으니 상관 없겠지요.[#Legal]

A genuine 1980’s boombox – great to look at but no longer in working order. Just as well as the tape deck only played backwards and the radio station was stuck on BRBK FM 102.2 - Saddle Sore Cowboy Poetry with Big Al. Whatever floats your boat, pard'ner...[#Legal]
正宗80年代的音箱，外表看來很酷，但其實已經不能再用了。例如它只能倒轉播放音樂帶，而收音機永遠卡在BRBK FM 102.2… 聽天由命吧，朋友！[#Legal]
